setup-worktree-unix: echo 'üìã Copying configuration files from root worktree...'
[ -f "$ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/lib/supabase_config.dart" ] && cp "$ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/lib/supabase_config.dart" lib/supabase_config.dart || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  supabase_config.dart not found in root'

[ -f "$ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/lib/google_places_config.dart" ] && cp "$ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/lib/google_places_config.dart" lib/google_places_config.dart || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  google_places_config.dart not found in root'
[ -f "$ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/lib/weather_config.dart" ] && cp "$ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/lib/weather_config.dart" lib/weather_config.dart || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  weather_config.dart not found in root'
[ -f "$ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/lib/firebase_options.dart" ] && cp "$ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/lib/firebase_options.dart" lib/firebase_options.dart || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  firebase_options.dart not found in root'

[ -f "$ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/android/app/google-services.json" ] && cp "$ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/android/app/google-services.json" android/app/google-services.json || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  google-services.json not found in root'
[ -f "$ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/android/local.properties" ] && cp "$ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/android/local.properties" android/local.properties || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  android/local.properties not found in root'

[ -f "$ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/ios/Runner/GoogleService-Info.plist" ] && cp "$ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/ios/Runner/GoogleService-Info.plist" ios/Runner/GoogleService-Info.plist || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  GoogleService-Info.plist not found in root'
dart run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Code generation skipped (may need manual run)'
echo '‚úÖ Worktree setup complete! Each agent can now work independently.'
setup-worktree-windows: echo Copying configuration files from root worktree...
if exist "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\lib\supabase_config.dart" (copy "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\lib\supabase_config.dart" lib\supabase_config.dart) else (echo ‚ö†Ô∏è  supabase_config.dart not found in root)

if exist "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\lib\google_places_config.dart" (copy "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\lib\google_places_config.dart" lib\google_places_config.dart) else (echo ‚ö†Ô∏è  google_places_config.dart not found in root)
if exist "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\lib\weather_config.dart" (copy "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\lib\weather_config.dart" lib\weather_config.dart) else (echo ‚ö†Ô∏è  weather_config.dart not found in root)
if exist "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\lib\firebase_options.dart" (copy "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\lib\firebase_options.dart" lib\firebase_options.dart) else (echo ‚ö†Ô∏è  firebase_options.dart not found in root)

if exist "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\android\app\google-services.json" (copy "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\android\app\google-services.json" android\app\google-services.json) else (echo ‚ö†Ô∏è  google-services.json not found in root)
if exist "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\android\local.properties" (copy "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\android\local.properties" android\local.properties) else (echo ‚ö†Ô∏è  android\local.properties not found in root)

if exist "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\ios\Runner\GoogleService-Info.plist" (copy "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH\ios\Runner\GoogleService-Info.plist" ios\Runner\GoogleService-Info.plist) else (echo ‚ö†Ô∏è  GoogleService-Info.plist not found in root)
dart run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs || echo ‚ö†Ô∏è  Code generation skipped (may need manual run)
echo ‚úÖ Worktree setup complete! Each agent can now work independently.
setup-worktree: echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Generic fallback. For better support, define OS-specific scripts.'
